pages.text: The $(major)Milky$(0) Gene allows the entity to be $(minor)milked with a Bucket$(0). If a player has it, they can $(minor)milk themselves$(0) by sneak right-clicking with a Bucket.$(br2)This has a configurable cooldown, with the default being 1 tick.$(br2)This Gene $(minor)can be given to mobs$(0).
By default, you can get this gene from the following mobs:$(br)$(li)Cow$(li)Goat
